item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Enigma_, post:52, topic:435815”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538537.msg3952931#msg3952931 date=1332460768]

Wow.
Strange to come back and find such talk.

There are a few other people who know the Name Hack, namely Svew, Champ/Cosmic, and Hipi.
Myself, Danny, and the aforementioned people are the only ones who know it and none of us have leaked it to the best of my knowledge.

Anyways, it’s incredibly useful for luring, as it can be used to PM to RuneScape.

That’s about all I have to say.

~Enigma.

fuck off
[/quote]
Rude?[/quote]
